modShortDescription: Player now respawns at death location with a 10-second (configurable in Config/buffs.xml) invulnerability buff for running away.
modDescription:
## Purpose

* Player now [respawns](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-respawn/) at death location with a 10-second (configurable in Config/buffs.xml) invulnerability buff for running away
* Challenge quests no longer auto-fail on death
* Optional: Uncomment lines in Config/entityclasses.xml to remove death XP penalty

## Mod Installation

Extract the archive or copy cloned git repo to <7D2D\_Home>/Mods dir. This mod uses Harmony and will only work with A20 and above.

Full source code: [GitHub](https://github.com/devopsdinosaur/SpawnInPlace)

**[Download](https://github.com/devopsdinosaur/SpawnInPlace/releases/download/v0.0.1/SpawnInPlace-v0.0.1.zip)**

**Credits:** devopsdinosaur
